testcase.classname: To validate the functionality of Metallica application
testcase.name: To validate login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in metallica home page........................................passed When User navigate to login page............................................passed And User have to enter "Metallica12@gmail.com" and "metallica123"...........passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then User should be in a invalid credentials page...........................passed

testcase.name: To validate login with invalid credentials 2
